row.process:
!Pull out total and available memory from variable ! @ECHO OFF echo Checking system memory.. :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_WINDOWS.PRV.VARA.SYSINFO_MEMORY) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &RESULT# = STR_FIND(&KEY#,"Physical Memory") : IF &RESULT# <> 0 : SET &VAL#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,3) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&VAL#," ") : SET &VAL# = STR_CUT(&VAL#,1,&POS#) : SET &VAL# = STR_RTRIM(&VAL#) : SET &VAL# = STR_SUB(&VAL#,",","") : P &VAL# : IF &KEY# = "Total Physical Memory:" : PSET &UC4RB_TOTAL_MEMORY# = &VAL# echo Total Physical Memory: &VAL# MB : ENDIF : IF &KEY# = "Available Physical Memory:" : PSET &UC4RB_AVAILABLE_MEMORY# = &VAL# echo Available Physical Memory: &VAL# MB : ENDIF
: ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
echo Successfully get memory
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
